value.name: Jean Carlos Mejía promoted to Majors
value.description: Looking to strengthen its pitching staff, Cleveland recalled right-hander Jean Carlos Mejía from Triple-A Columbus. Before the promotion, Mejía allowed two runs in nine innings and struck out 10 batters for the Clippers.
